result.execSummary:
The defendant Patrick Henry Sawyer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 1st Reckless Homicide/Deliver Drugs [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.02(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: Joint and Several.  If probation is revoked or will discharge with outstanding financial obligations due, a civil judgment shall be entered for the balance due.
Submit DNA sample.  Defendant is to testify against co defendants if necessary.

from defendant with copy of AODA completion certificate.

Defendant's letter request filed 10/18/19 was addressed at 8/15/19 hearing and denied.    bbr
Order to change restitution payee.
Filed by Atty Alexander J Kostal.

ADA Crystal Long appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant appeared by video from Oregon Correctional.  No appearance by Atty Ruby.  Defendant set letter to court requesting amendment to JOC to change restitution to individual breakdown instead of joint and several.  ADA Long stated victim are present.  ADA Long states this is joint agreement and objects to any amendment to JOC.  ADA Long will file motion requesting checks should be made out to Donald Klamer as now it is made out to estate and checks cannot be cashed.  No objection by defendant.  Motion denied to amend JOC.  Defendant questioned amount of restitution that has been paid.  Court made explanation.  ADA Long will request probation review hearings with co defendants on why restitution not being paid by them.
Filed by Defendant.
Motion hearing on August 15, 2019 at 09:30 am.

Amended Restitution stipulation joint and several in the probation amount of $13,913.00 plus surcharge for a total of $15,304.30
filed by attorney Cole Ruby.

Defendant Patrick Henry Sawyer in court, in custody with attorney Cole Daniel Ruby.  Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Agreement was recited by State.  Victims father made statement to Court.  Closing statements by counsel.  Defendant made statement.  Court sentenced defendant to serve 14 years in prison.  4 years initial confinement, and 10 years extended supervision.  Conditions of extended supervision are: $518.00 costs.  Payment of restitution (joint and several)per stipulation.  Submit DNA sample.  Defendant is to testify against co defendants if necessary.  Sentence credit of 224 days.  Defendant is not eligible for challenge incarceration program or substance abuse program.  9:44/10:13

Agreement put on the record.

Defendant Patrick Henry Sawyer by video, in custody with attorney Cole Daniel Ruby.  Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Warrant quashed.  $20,000.00 cash bond.  Standard felony conditions.  Time limits waived.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 13, 2016 at 03:00 pm.  Return date scheduled for May 18, 2016 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant Patrick Henry Sawyer in court with attorney Tristan F Eagon.  Christine Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
